casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Devon Maurice GLYNN No. 480P06-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2018 Devon Glynn, for Glynn, Devon Maurice. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 17th of October 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2018."
